mapper.select: select project.projname as projectName,COUNT(*) as households,project.price as unitPrice ,sum(usewater.amount) as projectNumDay,sum(usewater.amount) * project.price as projectPriceDay, concat(usewater.year, LPAD(usewater.month,2,0), LPAD(usewater.day,2,0)) as time from project JOIN user ON project.id=user.projid JOIN usewater ON user.meterid=usewater.meterid GROUP BY project.id
